140.heading: Voices.
140.title: "Hearing Voices"
140.author: Leonard Starr.
notes: Summary: Annie tries to tell "Daddy" that Punjee and Talya have left; "Daddy" is on the telephone to the Warbucks Research Center, it seems a voice has told Prof. Ezra Eon to go somewhere.

141.heading: Voices.
141.title: "Hearing Voices"
141.author: Griffy.
notes: Summary: Zippy's voice described in comparison with the voices of William Bendix, Fred Gwynne, Raymond Burr, John Goodman, and Julia Child.
Key words: Rotundity, wet feedback, dazed innocence, resonant earnestness, precise authority, calm reassurance, puzzling girlishness.
